fg_segments: WineHQ Privacy Policy WineHQ is dedicated to the privacy of its users.
Whatever specific information you give to us will be used only to enable user specific features of WineHQ websites.
We will not give your information to third parties, nor will we send you email you did not request.
WineHQ uses cookies only to preserve login information in your web browser.
Advertisers or other companies do not have access to these cookies.
WineHQ uses Google Analytics to better understand our user base.
WineHQ will not disclose this information to other parties.
We may amend this policy from time to time.
If we make any substantial changes in the way we use your personal information we will notify you by posting a prominent announcement on our pages.
Questions about this privacy policy can be answered on our Forum

Questions about this privacy policy can be answered on our Forum
raw_html:
WineHQ Wiki:Privacy policy

From WineHQ Wiki

WineHQ Privacy Policy
 WineHQ is dedicated to the privacy of its users.
 Whatever specific information you give to us will be used only to enable user specific features of WineHQ websites. We will not give your information to third parties, nor will we send you email you did not request.
 WineHQ uses cookies only to preserve login information in your web browser. Advertisers or other companies do not have access to these cookies.
 WineHQ uses Google Analytics to better understand our user base. WineHQ will not disclose this information to other parties.
 We may amend this policy from time to time. If we make any substantial changes in the way we use your personal information we will notify you by posting a prominent announcement on our pages.
 Questions about this privacy policy can be answered on our Forum









                Hosted By
friendly_summaries: We collect data directly on our website.
We share data with third parties.
We require your consent consent before data is collected/shared.
We do not share data with third parties. This concerns our users' information (like contact information).
We require your consent consent before data is collected/shared. Choices we mention apply to data sharing with and collection by third parties.
This concerns our users' information (like contact information).
We collect data directly on our website. (e.g. cookies and tracking technologies).
You can use the browser or mobile device settings to block trackers or cookies, activate Do-Not-Track, disable location sharing, clear history, etc.
We use third-party services/libraries that might allow other companies to track you. (e.g. cookies and tracking technologies).
We use services from third parties, which can allow them to collect data from you when you use our service. (e.g. cookies and tracking technologies).
We take security measures to guard your data. We particularly use technologies that safeguard against unauthorized access.
We receive your information from other partners, specified in our policy  We need this to do research and analytics about the usage of the product.
We use third-party services/libraries that might allow other companies to track you.  We need this to do research and analytics about the usage of the product.
We do not share data with third parties.
We will update this privacy policy whenever we change our terms and conditions.
We will send you personal notice whenver we change our privacy policy. This is when the change includes significant changes in our data practices (e.g., data collection, sharing, and retention)
We collect data directly on our website.
